name: Heroes of Might and Magic II: Desecrated Lands
summary: Heroes of Might and Magic II: Desecrated Lands is a freeware non-canonical map pack developed by Dark Entertainment and various authors, and distributed by East Valley Software, released in late 1997 with some editions of Heroes of Might and Magic II: The Succession Wars for Microsoft Windows. Included in the form of a bonus CD, it was provided as an extra feature at no extra cost.
